long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will NOT work UNLESS you have an account at revenue-retriever.com and provetcloud.com.  You also need to contact support@revenue-retriever.com and ask to be on the plugin pilot program.

This is a technology preview of the Revenue Retriever integration being build directly into Provet.  This plugin will become obsolete when Provet release the fully integrated version.

What it does: It will alter the provetcloud consultation page and block submission until the user has complied with rules in Revenue Retriever.

v1.1 - Added Spanish Language Support
